Class Order

java.lang.Object
OrderService.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an order with a unique id.

Invariants:

  • product_id always exists.
  • user_id always exists.
  • quantity always exists and positive.
  • status always exists.
  • id always exists.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final AtomicInteger
    id_counter
    A thread-safe counter used to generate unique, sequential order IDs.

      Parameters:
      product_id - the product id
      user_id - the user id
      quantity - the order quantity; must be positive
      status - the order status
